legend_0050_friend_01: Come out, come out, wherever you are![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_02: Yes! Found it! Here’s our little herb![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_04:
This shape! This sheen! It looks like it’ll taste
horrible, which means it’s gotta be good for you![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_05:
Now then, let’s see... What does the book have
to say?[npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_a:
It says here that the [clr:6]Sweet Herba Mystica[clr:0] is good
for gut health and that it helps aid digestion.\c
Says it’s great for stomachaches, too, or when
you want to stimulate the ol’ appetite![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_b:
Well, apparently [clr:6]Salty Herba Mystica[clr:0] helps with
aching hands and feet. Good for neuropathy and\r
numbness.\c
When you’ve got muscle weakness, it supposedly
builds up strength again![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_c:
[clr:6]Bitter Herba Mystica[clr:0]’s great for your circulation!
It really gets the blood flowing!\c
And that warms you right up, nice and toasty,
even boosting the immune system!\c
...Or so it says.[npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_d:
OK, [clr:6]Sour Herba Mystica[clr:0] is chock-full of nutrients
and is great for boosting your overall health!\c
Says here it works wonders whether you’re tired
physically or mentally. Perks you right up![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_e:
So it seems [clr:6]Spicy Herba Mystica[clr:0]’s supposed to
boost your metabolism!\c
It gives your circulation a boost and helps flush
out all those toxins...along with a ton of sweat![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_06: No time to waste—let’s get some food going![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_07:
Sorry for the wait!\c
Here’s a super healthy sandwich that’ll perk
you right up once you eat it![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_08:
Plus, as a token of our friendship, here’s another
Titan Badge! Gaze upon it in awe as you eat.[npcn:6]
legend_0050_system_02:
[BD06:0]Do you want to give your sandwich
to [pknm:1]?
legend_0050_system_03:
[BD06:0]Maybe you want to give your sandwich to
[pknm:1]\r
after all?
legend_0050_friend_09: Come on out, Mabosstiff! Food’s up![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_10:
Oh-ho-ho! Would you look at that! Seems like
someone’s got a proper appetite now![npcn:6]
legend_0050_system_04: [pknm:1] will be able to dash now!
legend_0050_system_05:
[BD06:0][pknm:1] will be able to jump
higher now!
legend_0050_system_06: [BD06:0][pknm:1] will be able to glide now!
legend_0050_system_07:
[BD06:0][pknm:1] will be able to move across the
water now!
legend_0050_system_08:
[BD06:0][pknm:1] will be able to climb up
vertical\r
surfaces\r
now!
legend_0050_friend_12:
Seems like that fellow’s also slowly regaining its
original strength.[npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_13:
Still...doesn’t look like it’s anywhere close to
returning to its battle form.[npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_14:
It seems healthy enough physically...\c
Maybe it’s got some kind of mental block that’s
preventing it from returning to its true form?[npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_15:
I’ve read about it in books before...\c
A mental scar. Like psychological trauma,
you know? I think that’s what you call it.[npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_19:
Maybe it had a terrifying experience in battle,
so now it’s scared to battle at all?[npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_16:
Well, don’t worry! I’m sure both that brute and
Mabosstiff will make a full recovery eventually![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_17:
So, how do you feel, Mabosstiff? How’s that
Herba Mystica working?[npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_28:
Not like it’s fair to expect every kind of Herba
Mystica to have some huge effect, right?[npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_29:
And it’s not like the effect has to be immediate,
either.[npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_23:
[BD06:0][trnm:0] and I are gonna make
sure\r
you’re\r
right\r
as rain![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_24:
We’ve got one more herb to go...and I bet it’s
the best of them all![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_26:
All right, [trnm:0]!\c
The next stop on our little herb hunt should be
the last![npcn:6]
legend_0050_friend_27:
But we can’t lose steam until we’re done!
Let’s keep up our momentum! Here! We! Go![npcn:6]
